turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file a claim. I got into a car accident last week and my car is pretty messed up.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am very sorry to hear about your accident. I can certainly help you with that. To get started, could you please provide your policy number and the date of the accident?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my policy number is ABC123XYZ and the accident happened on October 26th. This is all so frustrating. I've never dealt with this before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I have located your policy and accident details. Now, I see that the police report is not yet attached to this claim. Can you confirm that the other driver was at fault? If so, please provide any evidence like dashcam footage or witness statements if you have them. Also, what is the make and model of your vehicle?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I think the other driver *was* at fault, but the police report hasn't been filed yet. Shouldn't you be able to find that out by contacting the police yourself? And my car is a 2018 Honda Civic. It's been a huge mess, and the other driver doesn't even have insurance!
